lines.content: * The main entry point for the Callie chatbot application.
* Callie reads user commands from standard input, processes task-related
* commands (todo, deadline, event, mark, unmark, list), and prints responses
* to standard output until the user exits with the command "bye".
System.out.println("Hello, I'm Callie! It's great to see you around today.\nWhat can I do for you?\n");
System.out.println(" Bye. Hope to see you again soon!");

* Prints a visual divider line to separate chatbot outputs.
* Represents a task that must be completed by a specific deadline.
* Constructs a Deadline task with a name and deadline.
* @param name     The description of the task.
* @param deadline The deadline by which the task should be completed.
* Returns a string representation of the deadline task.
* @return A formatted string indicating the task type, completion status,
* Represents an event task that occurs over a specific time period.
* Constructs an Event task with a name, start time, and end time.
* @param name  The description of the event.
* @param start The start time of the event.
* @param end   The end time of the event.
public Event(String name, String start, String end) {
* Returns a string representation of the event task.
* @return A formatted string indicating the task type, completion status,
* An abstract representation of a task.
* A task has a name and a completion status. Subclasses define
* specific task types such as ToDo, Deadline, and Event.
/** Indicates whether the task has been completed. */
* Constructs a task with the given name.
* @param name The description of the task.
* Returns a string representation of the task.
* @return A formatted string showing the task's completion status and name.
* Marks the task as not completed.
* Represents a simple to-do task without any date or time constraints.
* Constructs a ToDo task with the given name.
* @param name The description of the to-do task.
* Returns a string representation of the to-do task.
* @return A formatted string indicating the task type, completion status,
